apps.name: Yattee
apps.subtitle: Video player for Invidious and Piped
apps.versionDescription:
- Added Piped accounts support
- Enabled text selection for video description
- Fixed share functionality which was occasionally using an incorrect URL
- Other minor improvements
apps.localizedDescription:
Video player with support for Invidious and Piped instances built for iOS 15, tvOS 15 and macOS Monterey.
Features:
- Native user interface built with SwiftUI
- Multiple instances and accounts, fast switching
- SponsorBlock, configurable categories to skip
- Player queue and history
- Fullscreen playback, Picture in Picture and AirPlay support
- Stream quality selection
- Favorites: customizable section of channels, playlists, trending, searches and other views
- URL Scheme for integrations
